get.description: Retrieve all articles with type 1, supports search and filtering. Results are paginated with 9 items per page.

parameters.name: search_category
parameters.description: Search keyword for category article names

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for filtering articles (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for filtering articles (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

get.summary: Get all news data with pagination
get.description: Retrieve all news data. Supports search by 'nama' and filtering by date range using 'created_at'. Results are paginated with 9 items per page.

parameters.name: search_category
parameters.description: Search keyword for news category names

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for filtering news (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for filtering news (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

get.description: Retrieve a single news entry by ID
Retrieve all Perangkat Ajar with type 1. Supports search by 'nama' and 'kelas'.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search keyword for Materi Bahan Ajar

parameters.name: kelas
parameters.description: Search keyword for class Materi Bahan Ajar
